definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

sentences.english: With decreasing the film thickness, the maximum absorptance appears.
sentences.chinese: 随着薄膜厚度减小，吸收率具有极大值。

sentences.english: It presents an analytic solution for the theme by pontryagin maximum principle.
sentences.chinese: 应用极大值原理导出了它的解析解。

sentences.english: There is a maximum of the surface diffusivity in high surface coverage.
sentences.chinese: 在表面覆盖度比较高时，表面扩散系数有一极大值。

sentences.english: So there exists a critical period, at which, the limit ratio reaches its maximum value.
sentences.chinese: 因此，存在一个临界周期使高宽比限值取得极大值。

sentences.english: The ions appear late in the morning and reach their maximum values at noon.
sentences.chinese: 离子早晨出现较迟，在中午达到它们的极大值。

sentences.english: Carnot's Theorem discusses the extreme value of the efficiency of heat engines' cycles.
sentences.chinese: 根据卡诺定理给出了热机的循环效率极大值问题。

sentences.english: So there exists a critical period, at which the height width ratio reaches its maximum value.
sentences.chinese: 因此，存在一个临界周期使高宽比限值取得极大值。

definition: perihelion, the nearest point of a planet in elliptic orbit to the sun/lower apsis
derived function/derivative f' of a function f
